comments:
Build 20020402

(Mistakenly) Created an empty Java project called WVCM
Went to CVS repositories view and defined the CVS repository,
Browsed to the WVCM folder, and choose to 'Checkout as Project'
Was warned that it would overwrite the existing project, I said 'yes'.
